original: @219b # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @219b # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: badzra gandha r'i s'a dha nam /
analyzed: badzra gandha r'i s'a dha nam /
translated: Vajragandhāri-sādhana

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: rdo rje gandha r'i'i sgrub thabs /
analyzed: rdo rje gandha r'i'i sgrub thabs /
translated: Vajragandhāri's Means of Achievement

original: rdo rje gandha r'i la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: rdo rje gandha r'i la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to Vajragandhāri.

original: rdo rje g'andha r'i nag mo zhal drug pa /
analyzed: rdo rje g'andha r'i nag mo zhal drug pa /
translated: Vajragandhāri is black, with six faces,

original: phyag bcu gnyis pa /🔽dbu skra kham pa gyen du brdzes shing zhabs g-yon brkyang ba /
analyzed: phyag bcu gnyis pa / dbu skra kham pa gyen du brdzes shing zhabs g-yon brkyang ba /
translated: twelve arms,🔽her tawny hair bristling upward, and her left leg extended.

original: zhal mche ba gtsigs pa /
analyzed: zhal mche ba gtsigs pa /
translated: Her mouths gape with bared fangs.

original: zhal so so la spyan gsum gsum pa /
analyzed: zhal so so la spyan gsum gsum pa /
translated: Each face has three eyes.

original: g-yas kyi phyag drug rnams su go rims bzhin du rdo rje dang / rdo rje dril bu dang / ral gri dang / rtse gsum dang / mda' dang / 'khor lo rnams so //
analyzed: g-yas kyi phyag drug rnams su go rims bzhin du rdo rje dang / rdo rje dril bu dang / ral gri dang / rtse gsum dang / mda' dang / 'khor lo rnams so //
translated: In her six right hands she holds, in order, a vajra, a vajra-bell, a sword, a trident, an arrow, and a wheel.

original: g-yon gyi phyag drug rnams su kha tv'am ga dang / lcags kyu dang gzhu dang / dgra sta dang / zhags pa dang / snying gar sdigs mdzub 'phyar ba'o //
analyzed: g-yon gyi phyag drug rnams su kha tv'am ga dang / lcags kyu dang gzhu dang / dgra sta dang / zhags pa dang / snying gar sdigs mdzub 'phyar ba'o //
translated: In her six left hands she holds a khaṭvāṅga, a goad, a bow, an axe, a noose, and a threatening forefinger at her heart.

original: zhal dang bo ni nag po'o //
analyzed: zhal dang bo ni nag po'o //
translated: Her first face is black.

original: zhal gzhan lnga ni kha dog lnga ste /
analyzed: zhal gzhan lnga ni kha dog lnga ste /
translated: The other five faces are the five colors.

original: dkar po dang / ser po dang dmar po dang / ljang gu dang / sngon po'o //
analyzed: dkar po dang / ser po dang dmar po dang / ljang gu dang / sngon po'o //
translated: white, yellow, red, green, and blue.

original: sna tshogs padma dang nyi ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa'o //
analyzed: sna tshogs padma dang nyi ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa'o //
translated: They stand on variegated lotus and sun seats.

original: 'di la yang gzungs 'di'o //
analyzed: 'di la yang gzungs 'di'o //
translated: Here, too, is the dhāraṇī:

original: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
analyzed: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
translated: Homage to the Three Jewels.

original: na ma:tsanda badzra p'a na ye /
analyzed: na ma:tsanda badzra p'a na ye /
translated: Homage to Caṇḍa-vajra-pāṇi,

original: ma h'a yaksha se n'a pa ta ye /🔽na mo bha ga wa ti ma h'a badzra gandha r'i aa ne ka sha ta s'a ha sra pra dzva li ta di pte dzra li ta d'i pte dz'a yee au gra bh'i ma bha y'a na k'a yee @220a * //
analyzed: ma h'a yaksha se n'a pa ta ye / na mo bha ga wa ti ma h'a badzra gandha r'i aa ne ka sha ta s'a ha sra pra dzva li ta di pte dzra li ta d'i pte dz'a yee au gra bh'i ma bha y'a na k'a yee @220a * //
translated: lord of the great yakṣa hosts.🔽Homage to the Blessed One, the great vajra-scent Gaurī, with countless hundreds of thousands of blazing flames, with a terrifying body,

original: yo g'i n'i yee bhi sha ma bha gi n'i yee dva da sha bhu dza yee bi k'i rna ke sh'i ye aa ne ka r'u pa bi bi dha be sha dha ra n'i yee ae hye dbhag wa t'i ma h'a badzra gandha r'i tra ya n'am ratna
analyzed: yo g'i n'i yee bhi sha ma bha gi n'i yee dva da sha bhu dza yee bi k'i rna ke sh'i ye aa ne ka r'u pa bi bi dha be sha dha ra n'i yee ae hye dbhag wa t'i ma h'a badzra gandha r'i tra ya n'am ratna
translated: the yoginī, the one who has attained accomplishment, the one with twelve arms, the one with various hair styles, the one who holds various forms and appearances, come, Blessed One, to the great vajra-scent Gaurī, to the refuge of the precious

original: n'm sa tye na a'a kadhya aa kaddhya ba la de w'a de kam ye ts'a nye sa ma ye na tishtha na ti t'a n'a barta yi shy'a mi /
analyzed: n'm sa tye na a'a kadhya aa kaddhya ba la de w'a de kam ye ts'a nye sa ma ye na tishtha na ti t'a n'a barta yi shy'a mi /
translated: If it is true, then let it be so, O god, by the truth of all the Tathāgatas, remain firm, O earth, by the truth of the Vajra Realm,

original: sh'i ghram grihna grihna aom aa li aa li hu lu hu lu mu lu mu lu tsu lu tsu lu dha ma dha ma ram ga ram ga ram g'a pa ya ram g'a pa ya p'u ra ya p'u ra ya /
analyzed: sh'i ghram grihna grihna aom aa li aa li hu lu hu lu mu lu mu lu tsu lu tsu lu dha ma dha ma ram ga ram ga ram g'a pa ya ram g'a pa ya p'u ra ya p'u ra ya /
translated: Śīghra gṛhaṇa gṛhaṇa oṃ ali ali hulu hulu mulu mulu culu culu dhama dhama raṃga raṃga raṃgāpaya raṃgāpaya pūraya pūraya,

original: a'a bi sha a'a bi sha bha ga ba t'i ma h'a badzra gandha r'i siddha tsanda badzra p'a ni r'a dzny'a pa ya ti hr'i:ha ha h'um phat sv'ah'a /
analyzed: a'a bi sha a'a bi sha bha ga ba t'i ma h'a badzra gandha r'i siddha tsanda badzra p'a ni r'a dzny'a pa ya ti hr'i:ha ha h'um phat sv'ah'a /
translated: āviśāviśa bhagavati mahāvajra-gāndhārī siddha-candavajrapāṇirājñāpayati hṛḥ ha ha hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.

original: 'di'i las rab tu brkyang pa ni cho ga 'di las so //
analyzed: 'di'i las rab tu brkyang pa ni cho ga 'di las so //
translated: The extension of its activity is from this ritual.

original: rdo rje gandha r'i'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so//
analyzed: rdo rje gandha r'i'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so//
translated: The sādhana of Vajragāndhārī is complete.
